website_summaries.verdict: Affordable rollerblades that are easy to adjust and look good too. Great for occasional skaters and beginners.
pros: Adjust to about a four-size variation with a simple button mechanism
Can also be worn by girls and teens
cons: Liners are prone to slipping and bunching

customer_reviews.title: Buy them af
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been literally searching for rollerblades all my life and never found the perfect ones (expensive af too). I finally met my destiny with these bad boys and I seriously can’t take em off. I literally roller bladed at 10PM pitch black 62 degrees out. I might sleep in them. Probably sign up for roller blade competitions and clubs. Moral of this review: BUY THEM
customer_reviews.author: Pamella

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first 6 miles and it was great! Super easy to adjust sizing. I wear 8.5 in women’s. Added some insoles for comfort! Definitely not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: beebit

customer_reviews.title: I give them a B+
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little unsure due to the reviews. The tongue as previous complaints is a little cheap. However after using them once I would recommend to anyone. I do 3 miles at a time about 4 times a week and these are great esp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jess moss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skates for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's (adult) size 9 shoe very consistently, and when adjusted to the largest setting these fit perfectly. I knocked off a star because the tongue on these was a bit less comfortable than more expensive skates I tried on, and the "insoles" were so flimsy I had to take them out because they fold in on themselves when I put the skates on. I love that the size is adjustable because I can loan them to our guests and it will probably make it easier to sell them if I ever stop using them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality adjustable skate
customer_reviews.text: The quality is better than I expected for an adjustable skate. These are the perfect size for my 10yo who is still growing. Both the liner and the outer boot adjust, so there is not uncomfortable bunching of the liner. They are holding up well to the wear-and-tear of a new skater.
customer_reviews.author: VTMomma

customer_reviews.title: good value *IF* your feet are still growing
customer_reviews.text: for the price, these are great skates. my kid grows so fast that I didn't want to spend a lot. they have a slightly cheap feel, and the light color/material shows scratches and road wear more than darker skates. but again, great value! UPDATE: downgraded from 4 to 3 stars... the boot is starting to break down and has cracked in half where your foot attaches to your leg (front ankle?) see pics for cracking, scratches, logo rubbing off and general wear. still fine skates if your feet are still growing, just know they won't last.
customer_reviews.author: art vendor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it spend the money for a better pair
customer_reviews.text: I loved skating as a child and was excited to get back out there as an adult. The design looks cute in picture however when you get them they are very (I do mean very) cheaply made. They are very uncomfortable and I can only skate for short periods of time because they hurt my feet so badly. I’ve skated 3 times and fallen twice but the skates have already broken and began to chip... again only after 3 uses. This product is aesthetically pleasing but not functional. It’s worth spending the extra money for a quality skate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skates are amazing, my daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Skates are amazing, my daughter loves them. They adjust to the perfect size, and are great to have; especially if you don't know what exact size you are. I bought them purposely for that reason and also the fact you can grow with them. They fit my teen daughter wonderfully, secure and snug like a skate should be
customer_reviews.author: stephanie murphy

customer_reviews.title: Wow perfect fit! Also the most comfortable skates I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow perfect fit! Also the most comfortable skates I have ever owned! Only wierd thing is that they are not shaped to look like they fit the left or right foot, but the brand name is on the outside of each so you can tell. Makes no difference in the way they fit though!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harcourt

customer_reviews.title: Well I want to return them.
customer_reviews.text: Well I want to return them. They look great and the wheels feel good. However these roller blades feel more bulky. The Brake feels like it’s made of Plastic then polyurethane. Which make them feel every unsafe when going downhill. The break is all black from underneath, not from the ground being dirty but more like when you burn plastic. There was way to many pressure points, so that made them uncomfortable to wear. If I losen the buckles then they feel to lose. Plus on of the buckles on the left broke . I wanted a refund but after contacting the seller I’m only able to get 50% back because they been used.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Careful the brake does not work
customer_reviews.text: Hello! buy these skates for my girlfriend the design is great and they are very comfortable, but they have something really bad my girlfriend used them only two days a few hours and the brakes are totally worn, they also do not work to slow down ... unfortunately I would not recommend these skates for children, only for people who really know how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine because the tongues are plastic and were constantly digging into the front of my leg. I rollerbladed with them once for about an hour and was not looking forward to doing it again. I'm getting ones with a soft tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my picky daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year olds skates were left in the garage and the cold weather cracked the plastic, so we were on a hunt for a new pair. We picked this pair and we sure are glad we did! The color is vibrant! Our daughter says how comfortable they are and how she loves that they have the snapping strap that she loves she much.....We can't get her out of them! We are lucky its a warmer Chicago winter thus far! I would definitely recommend this pair of Inline Skates for anyone looking for a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: ChristieL6

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great roller blades
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting rollerblades for a long time as an adult. These fit the bill. They're comfy, easily change sizes and accommodate my women's size 9 feet, and most of all, they are affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice Skates
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to rollerblade and have outgrown the childrens quality skates. I was looking for something with a little larger wheel than the basic in-line kids skates. These skates are a little large for my kids, but they tighten fine and seem to be no issue when skating. The build quality seems fine for a budget skate, and I expect they will give at least a few years of service to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors! Awesome look considering the price and perfectly adjustable, feel fine. I just got them and tried them on so not sure how they will do long term, but the price was great! I haven’t skated in a while, ice skating yes, but not rollerblading. Got these to gain some practice, used to be my favorite hobby. All in all, I am happy with my purchase, they could use an upgrade with the liner, especially in the tongue, it’s thinly padded and has some kind of thin plastic on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: if it's in your budget and you blade regularly, buy the higher end skates
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of BladeRunner rollerblades that I spent 80 bucks for. They're smooth, fast, and I've had them a few years and they're going strong. I got these after reading the reviews and figuring it wouldn't hurt to get another pair of blades for my teen daughters that like to rollerblade. We all agree these aren't as compact, smooth, and it's hard to tell which shoe is which. (: When they have a choice, they will choose my BR blades everytime over these ones. If you just want to spend a little and don't worry too much about comfort or smoothness, these will work in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great rollerblades!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife for Christmas and she absolutely LOVED them. In my opinion the Mint color looks so much better in person. I’ll admit I was skeptical at first but once I saw them in person I knew I made the right choice. These skates are great for not only beginners but people who already know how to skate. I tried skating in other skates about 3 years ago and I just couldn’t do it. So I tried my wife’s rollerblades on, I put it to the biggest size and even though they fit a bit snug I was able to skate no problem!! I’m definitely going to order pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fuentes III

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and slides nice and smooth, very happy with this product. Got in mint color very interesting and unusual. very happy with this rollerblades.
customer_reviews.author: Iri

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this rollers as bought them reading reviews and coze it showed me amazon choice and god honestly better spend a bit more money and get a really good ones rather then spending twice since anyway I will need to buy a new ones. They might be ok if you are on really good and flat road otherwise it’s not worth it. They are not even that comfortable as it left me with rashes on my legs. My advice look for a good brand ones if you really want to enjoy your rollskating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this skate , and how it looks , but the good ends there. These skates might be better for someone who is actually a size 9 , but for anyone under, you may be in a world of pain. I could not skate more than 5 minutes on these skates. I wear a size 7 , so I had to adjust the skate to fit my size. The skate then creates this overlapping portion and it makes a piercing pain wherever that part is.
customer_reviews.author: Snlnz

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: These were great! It was my first time blading in YEARS and it didn’t take long for me to get my balance down- these were a super smooth ride. They were very comfortable and easy to get on and off. Unfortunately I busted my a$$ after 20 mins because I went down a small hill and couldn’t stop...so I don’t know if I’m gonna use them again bc I’m still recovering and slightly traumatized. Considering buying knee pads and giving it another go. Tips for anyone who hasn’t bladed since they were 12- WEAR PANTS/PROTECT YOUR LEGS and stay away from hills....even small ones....
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Skates
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 11 year old daughter for Christmas and she loves them. She wears them almost everyday and has not had any issues with them for the past month. I like that the size adjusts to make them bigger as her foot grows so I'm not stuck getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA BAKER

customer_reviews.title: If you want broken bones be my guest
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a backup pair to throw in my car in case I wanted a break from my quad skates. If you want to roll your ankles and severely injure yourself these are the inlines for you! The buckles do not properly secure and there is too much additional space within the boot to ensure stability (I am a size 9 and even reduced the size with no increase in support whatsoever...) just spend the extra money on Moxi Skates especially if you’re a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE OUTDOORS
customer_reviews.text: Pros - adjustable fit works as stated, the colors are SUPER cute and they’re lightweight Cons - The brake pad is worthless outdoors...I was only able to accomplish a 2 mile ride before the brake pad was shredded and practically gone. The back wheel actually got stuck due to the plastic shred from the pad (this made for a very, very nice wipeout)! The latches on the boot also come undone with each fall. Not very sturdy or supportive. Overall would not recommend for anyone looking to skate outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Off center wheels........weird.
customer_reviews.text: The wheels don’t feel like they are in the middle of the skate.......and that is a very weird thing to say because I’ve never experienced this on any skates ever beside these. They also are aren’t shaped to your feet. They are made like straight lines and as a result whether you put them on the left foot or the right, you have no idea if it’s actually the correct foot aside from the position of the latches. They’re terrible. I was an avid skater and I bought these to teach my daughter. Pay extra and get better skates.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Painful
customer_reviews.text: These inline skates are very painful. I not a beginner, nor a pro, so I was looking for something decent and I thought these would have been the right purchase. I realized I was wrong. I returned them and got a 5th element skates which are a little bit more expensive but totally worth it. Remember you have to enjoy skating. If the skates don't fit perfectly you won't ever enjoy it and it also can be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my shoe size is 7.5 and these are big on me, even on the "smallest setting". They're fine... in the beginning. After a certain amount of time, the rollerblades developed a crack in both back wheels! Definitely did not expect that as I wasn't rollerblading on the pavement, but on smooth & flat flooring. Wondering if there could be a return or refund option, as I would've like more than 12 good uses out of these blades... Buy them only if you don't rollerblade too often... I guess they are not for long-term usage :/
customer_reviews.author: Anca E. Oprea

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I just received these a few days ago and they are great. I didn't realize they were expandable (they expand from sizes 6-9). I am thinking they are more for teens whose feet keep growing and not adults but I like them. They do look a little kiddish but they work and fit so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Fonte

customer_reviews.title: Very stable
customer_reviews.text: These are great for me! I'm a beginner who just wanted to start somewhere and not spend a ton of money to do it. Have a friend who spent 150 and I honestly like mine better, the stability is great and important for my weak ankles. I was weary to buy due to bad reviews, bit glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah boehle

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY DO NOT MAKE MY MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: don't buy it, it breaks super easily, its super uncomfortable, and although its cheap its money I wish I could get back. please use your money on an appropriate roller blade. if you don't mind quad skating, buy some rio skates which are 90-100$ but are considered on the cheaper side for quality skates. IF YOU BUY THESE ITLL HURT YOUR FEET SO MUCH AFTER EVEN A MINUTE OF STANDING IN THEM. THREE PEOPLE HAVE TRIED IT AND THREE HAVE ALL WANTED TO STOP SKATING AFTER A FEW MINUTES BECAUSE IT HURT THAT BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Delatorre

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: The front piece literally cracked in half after a few months of use. These aren’t used everyday so this should not have happened after just a few months. Actually I’ve never seen this happen with inline skates. It, of course, is after the eligible return/replace time frame so now we need to by new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Get some insoles and you'll have a nice pair-o-skates
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter. Like most of the other reviews say, you are gonna have to get new better insoles. Once we found some good ones (with odor eaters of course) she has loved them ever since. And yes, her feet stank
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Lee Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners but will be getting a different pair.
customer_reviews.text: So these are really great for the first few times but the adjustable toes start to slide on their own and I have to keep taking them off the slide them back to where I had them. And the clasps loosen up on their own too and I have keep redoing them. This is my first pair of skates so I have fallen A LOT! So I may have broken something haha but it's definitely good for beginners but I will be buying something a little more high-end for my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: karmen childs

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are simply adorable for starters. They look exactly as pictured. They are comfortable and easily adjustable ok foot size as mentioned. Snagged them at a great price. It’s no wonder why they constantly sell out. Can’t wait to roll around more in these gems!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Hurt the feet a little bit
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s just my feet, or if I just don’t have this buckled to fit right, but these hurt my dang feet like no other. After about 5 mins I’m ready to call it quits. I haven’t got much of chance to wear them, and maybe I’m just not used to them. I will update later if I can find more comfort in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jon and Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Price matches the quality
customer_reviews.text: We got a men's and women's pair of these blades. They are very unstable, he overall product looks pretty sketchy once you get them out of the box. We don't' do anything crazy with them (I don't think they would with stand it), but I don't feel like they are ever secure enough to make it not feel like you're going to break your ankles. These are good for using maybe a handful of times. I wouldn't want to use them over a substantial amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price. Won’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these at the start of the pandemic to keep me busy. I was new to skating and didn’t want to invest too much. They got the job done and are cute! Not super comfy, and after two months of heavy use, the front wheel broke and the plastic guard cracked. I’ve since bought a much higher quality pair.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these skates! I used to skate when I was a kid but lost it for awhile, and these were perfect for getting back into it. You can tell they aren’t high quality skates, but for $40, they do their job perfectly! It was hard for me to tell which foot was left and which foot was right, but I love that I could adjust the size of the skate. I usually wear an 8 but in these I wear a 9. Very good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara O

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These roller blades have put on some miles! My daughter has owned them almost one year now, and skates at least a few times a month. They have held up on the roller rink, as well as, on the sidewalk. She wears a women size 8 and they fit her nice. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Little momma of 2

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal skates for an intermediate skater
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 12 but is quite the skater. She uses these both in our basement garage and at the rink. Our local rink does a weekly age race and she has went from a top 3 finisher to winning the last 4 races she’s entered. Not only are they fast with a long base, but she had some fit issues due to over pronating foot with her last pair of skates. She has yet to complain about any pain or discomfort with these!
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Robison

customer_reviews.title: Beginner skates
customer_reviews.text: The fit is ok.it's nice that you can really tighten it and also adjust the length to get the perfect fit. The style definitely reflects the price and we will probably purchase a more expensive pair next time. But for a beginner,these serve their purpose and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shaunsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order these after some reviews I had read however, for the price I ordered them anyway. I'm glad I did! They fit great and can extend sizes! They are comfortable, and well made. Mine have taken a beating (with me trying to remember how to rollerblade) and are still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my girlfriend for Christmas but I even adjusted them and tried them on. They fit perfectly, are easy to adjust and ride great. Almost want to buy some of my own but I’m not great in skates. :)
customer_reviews.author: Climbyourarms

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I wanted to learn to skate. Great pair of first skates! Very comfortable and cute color.
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Patty J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love rollerblading but haven’t in years.. so I wanted good quality for a nice price point happy to say I’ve found it! Only thing is sometimes when I’m standing still they kinda squeeze and hurt my feet but it’s important to have them fit properly and securely. So far no complaints!! Hope they last me awhile
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Too large around ankles
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 in women's shoes and these rollerblades are fit pretty big on me. Even after adjusting the size by the switch on the bottom. When I ride, I feel like they are too loose around my ankles. It hurts my shins. I have tightened them as far as they will go. Other than that, I don't really have any complaints... they're very pretty and ride well at first. But after serious riding, I start to notice how loose they are around the ankles, causing my shins to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for this price. I rode these around the beach and the bay for about 6 miles the other day. No issues at all. They are comfortable and probably the cutest pair out thee:)!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week- received defective pair?
customer_reviews.text: These rollerblades seemed good for someone just starting out who doesn’t want to invest a lot- however, the right foot has already broken after just one use. The “shoe” detached from the base. I may have just received a defective pair for them to break so quickly; hoping the seller will make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey E.

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick ankles
customer_reviews.text: I have thick calves, about 14 inches around where the top of the skates would sit. I have no problems when I go to skating rink and I was fine with the pair of rollerblades I had for 6 years. Tried these because of the price; can't even get them closed. There is pleanty of space in the foot, just not the ankle. I can clip them on the last thing and it pinches my skin between the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sionnach

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return these. I purchased them over a month ago but did not get to use them for a few weeks and missed the return window. They are difficult to adjust and leave my feet throbbing with pain. I tried with different heights and thickness of socks with no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the beginner or casual skater. They don’t feel like they will hold up to long-term heavy use. But I’m comparing them to my old roller blades that I’ve had for 30 years that finally just had some of the plastic around the lace hole crack, and those were solid! I like that they are lighter weight, it makes it easier to move and they glide so fast. These skates are a budget-friendly way for me to keep up with my daughter while she is on her rollerblades.
customer_reviews.author: Sayra B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m a women’s size 9 1/2 and they fit well on the largest size setting. I like that they’re adjustable. Wheels glide well on pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Gladem

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Within the first month of on/off use due to spring weather, the wheels are coming apart and other parts of the boot like the tongue are coming apart. Very disappointed and says only a 30 day return window so looks like we are stuck with this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Returned- painful AF
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning these as they felt cheap and they HURT. I was so ready to get these off my feet within 5 minutes of putting them on, so I ended up going with another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lstope426

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Well built and easy to change the size of the skates with a push of the button. Wish there was more sole cushion in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Faber

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size listed! Fits max of women’s 9
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT men’s size 6-9/women’s 7-10, as stated in the description! I wear women’s size 9 1/2-10 and they don’t fit me at all! They would fit women’s size 9, maximum. Have to return them unfortunately. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: These skates will last me a lonnnggggg time!!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was hesitant on buying skates. I bought skates from another retailer and was thoroughly disappointed. I got my faith back with these skates!!!! It is always difficult for me to find comfortable skates because I have an arch, and my feet are not skinny. These skates fit all of my comfort needs, and I also love the color scheme. I have gotten many compliments and these skates are phenomenal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for growing foot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very pleased with her blades, they roll smooth, grant it we only had them for a couple of weeks, but she's in them everyday! On the street at the rink, everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Seazons

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Super duper cute! Im a 6.5 and the 6 setting was PERFECT! i also have wide feet. these are adorable, comfy, and get a very smooth ride right off the bat, even on warped wood and pavement. spectacular! the only this i didnt like was the tongue. its really stiff but botgerwose, pull it to the outer part of the boot and youre good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE ROLLERBLADES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas this year for my daughter. She LOVES these!!! She uses them all the time. We take them to parks, outdoors, riverwalks, etc.. She gets so many compliments on them. They are comfortable and they are very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: April Renae

customer_reviews.title: Great price and performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: These cute minty-roller blades have brought me a lot of joy in the last month that I've had these. They're pretty darn comfortable and work as expected. Keeping me very entertained at home during quarantine!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Tried, onto the next
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these many times over the last three years and they hurt more every time. Shins, ankles, feet, all being rolled around in a plastic boot with next to no cushioning. Plus I’ve had several random plastic parts fall off...I’m finally about to get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor R

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: For the price these inline skates are not a bad purchase. It's convenient and simple to adjust, however they lack in padding and are uncomfortable to wear for more than 30min.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Son

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: As with my rollerblades when I was younger, thick socks are definitely key to not having the plastic dig into your ankles. That being said, with socks and leggings, these blades are doing the trick. You can’t beat the price and they are as fun as everyone else says in their reviews. If you’re just gonna cruise around, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The adjustable size is nice. She wears a women's 7 to 7 1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received these for her 12th birthday. She loves them and uses them often. She's had them for two months and so far they have held up well. She doesn't complain of any discomfort. The adjustable size is nice. She wears a women's 7 to 7 1/2 and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 11 year old daughter. She loves the color and fit. Built well and will hold up. She wears them at the park and roller rink.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great. As the other reviews said, the tongue is uncomfortable on your skin but that's an easy enough fix with some higher socks or wear long leggings
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to get fitted on comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cheap, the plastic adjusters slide all over the place so you can't clamp down to hold the size into place. Very hard to get fitted on comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: M Elder

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 and these are perfect for me! One of my guy friends even tried them out I think he is an 11 in mens and they fit him too!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Martin

customer_reviews.title: They do their job
customer_reviews.text: Scuff and scratch really easily. They look cheaply made too. BUT, they are in line skates, are a nice color, and my daughter likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Dezarey

customer_reviews.title: Wheels wouldn't spin at all when I first got these
customer_reviews.text: I had to take all the wheels off and clean/lubricate them for them to spin whatsoever. After all that, these work fine. Its cool that they are an adjustable size.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Stalter

customer_reviews.title: Wheels got stuck
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore them to skate through the park, one of the wheels got jammed after 30 minutes of skating. I was almost flung into a lake because I couldn't stop
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Broken Wheel! Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Had these blades for less than 8 months. Loved them until recently when I was skating along a bike path and fell after rolling over a crack. I look at the bottom of my blades and the right back wheel is broken! A quarter of the wheel is literally gone. I was hurt pretty bad and had to walk back home almost 3 miles. Do not buy these. Very poor quality. Btw, this is now the second time this happened. First time, I got the blades replaced. DO NOT BUY THESE. UPDATED PICTURE OF WEAR. You can see the white plastic under the wheel rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for 9.5 shoe size!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I’m a shoe size 9.5, and they fit well on the largest adjusted setting. They are super stable and good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Benson

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This go recked in less than 2 months and are noisy. I used them maybe twice a week on walking paths. They are hard to carry because the insides come out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most uncomfortable skates I've ever tried. Days later my ankles still hurt from wearing them for less than 10 minutes. So needless to say, these are getting returned!
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Too bad these weren't around when we were kids!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our Grand daughter age 14 so she won't have to rent skates very often. I think if is wonderful that they are made to grow with a person. Too bad these weren't around when we were kids. It is a fantastic idea for the growing kids. Good Job! The colors are wonderful as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: They skate nice
customer_reviews.text: Im a size 7 and I’ve modified them to size 6 and it’s still big. I don’t mind them but my friend who wears size 6 in shoes couldn’t skate in them because they were too big on her. So if you’re a size 6 DO NOT buy these. Other than that they skate really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the lowest quality roller blades I have ever worn / seen. The brake is slippery and does not work, super dangerous. Also they are very uncomfortable and hurt your feet to wear. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just as described and for the best price ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just as described and for the best price I would find. Great brand name with decent price. Bright colors just as pictured. Roll very well and comfortable. Hopefully they last long so I don't have to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: ... for my daughter for her birthday and she just loved them was everything we were expecting and a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for her birthday and she just loved them was everything we were expecting and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Jorden

customer_reviews.title: LOVE'EM!
customer_reviews.text: The clips are soooo much better than laces. You can make it tight where you want it. They also change length so they will fit perfectly! I absolutely love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. O'rien

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and good look!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They look just like the photo. I wear a size 7 flats, size 8 sneakers and they fit just fine. I’m far from a pro roller blader; I got these to start getting back into it since I haven’t done this since the 90s. They’re good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: They are great exceot the buttons on the side of the boot cam loose unglued i will glue tham back essy fix
customer_reviews.author: Terry Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Painful.
customer_reviews.text: Please do not purchase these. They are incredibly painful. I wore them for no more than 3 minutes and like all of the reviews said but I stupidly ignored, "they hurt like hell at the part where the extenders are." Don't waste your time. I promptly clicked returned and did so through Kohl's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: once i broke them in and the wheels roughed up a little they were STELLAR! love these and their really comfy
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bargain
customer_reviews.text: I feel.like this was great for the price seem to be holding up well 6 months later as comfortable as roller skates can be in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: B.W

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner rollerblade
customer_reviews.text: It pretty good, I do suggest loosing the wheels to get a better spin, you also can fit it perfectly to your foot size so that’s nice, the bearings are not the best but they work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa

customer_reviews.title: Good skates
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected/ I’m a size 9.5 in women’s .. wear long socks to avoid hurting your ankles- the tab click very quickly so be careful or you will get pinched !
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 26 and haven't rollerbladed since I was a kid so I was nervous about purchasing these but they're awesome! They're pretty comfortable for rollerblades and they haven't fallen apart on me yet and I was flying on them a little bit ago lol I would def recommend if you're not wanting to spend a ton of money on a pair of inlines!
customer_reviews.author: Derian Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and are easily adjusted to foot size
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these skates. They fit well and are easily adjusted to foot size. The colors are beautiful. It's just an all around perfect skate.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - TERRIBLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE! These scares are terrible quality. They are completely made of cheap plastic. Do yourself a favor and spend an extra $50 on some quality scares from socks sporting goods. These make your feet hurt so much that it’s a relief when they go numb.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Villa

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hard to break in, nothing I do can make these things comfortable! I get such a foot ache and have to stop and it's really annoying cause I'm not tired enough to need a rest but I have to rest my feet often.
customer_reviews.author: Mike /Katie HB

customer_reviews.title: Brake pad doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really enjoy these rollerblades, however I just wore them around the neighborhood and out of the box and the brake pad totally frayed and made it really dangerous for blading. I’m an adult with pretty good abilities, but I wouldn’t recommend this for anyone who relies on a brake pads, particularly in neighborhoods with hills! Sadly I have to return them; but otherwise they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Cedicci

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and sturdy. I like the ski-boot like buckles- they give more support. The upper rim is very uncomfortable by the top of my shin while rollerblading. Even if I loosen it up, it digs into my shin.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wobble Wobble
customer_reviews.text: If you want to guess for 15 minutes which skate is left and which skate is right, this is the product for you! The ankle support is TERRRRRIBlE and the size is not accurate, they were big. Not a good purchase, I've used them maybe twice for only 5 minutes each time because they hurt everywhere. Literally. Over priced and not good quality. Save your money and buy a Razor scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easily broken
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this product because they broke two days after I got them while traveling around. This wasn't worth 40+ dollars at all and pieces got broken off easily when I tried to tighten the buckles. I don't recommend you buy these at all
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Love these skates! I love how they expand to different shoe sizes, I can share with friends ! Smooth, but wear long socks with them, they may rub at ankle/lower calf if you are blading like a beast. Easy to put on and take off which is convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Lacek

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to learn to skate with my daughter but it was impossible. the purchase is very good.
customer_reviews.author: MCubias

product_meta.title: Roller Derby Women's V-Tech 500 Button Adjustable Inline Skate
product_meta.description: The V Tech 500 Girls Inline skate adjusts from sizes 6-9, which is accommodating for youth with growing feet. This skate provides support and stability with comfort padding and cam lever buckles that help your child get in and out of the skate quickly and easily without sacrificing a great fit. Roller Derby Skate Corp has been the leader in producing skate products for over 80 years. We are America's Skate Company. Our skates are designed to perform as well as they look. See our general and sizing information at www.rollerderby.com.
feature_bullets: Adjustable sizing at the push of a button! Great for children and teenager’s growing feet or adults who want a more custom fit. Accommodates womens shoe sizes 7 to 10 (unisex 6 to 9)
Incredibly lightweight for casual and recreational inline skating
Quick and easy to put on with triple buckle closure
Indoor/Outdoor urethane wheels and top-of-the-line Bevo Gold-7 Race rated bearings will carry you far and fast
High quality components and time-tested performance from America’s Skate Company, Roller Derby
